examples: Knowing what had happened, I avoided making any reference to (= mentioning) weddings.
I am writing with/in reference to (= in connection with) your letter of 15 March.

body_content.explanation: a writer or a book, article, etc. that is mentioned in a piece of writing, showing you where particular information was found
in a business letter, a number that tells you who to speak to or where to look for more information:
examples: In all future letters on this subject, please use/quote our reference JW/155/C.

body_content.explanation: a letter that is written by someone who knows you, to describe you and say if you are suitable for a job, course, etc.:
examples: My old headteacher said he would write/give me a glowing (= very good) reference.

body_content.explanation: a quick look at a book, piece of paper, etc. in order to find information and help:
examples: He made the whole speech without reference to the notes in front of him.
